amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt a claimant who is or has been living in public housing or any dwelling unit for which rental assistance provided under section 8.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to exempt a claimant who is or has been living in public housing or any dwelling unit for which rental assistance provided under section 8.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Espaillat amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 146).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Espaillat.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Espaillat amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 146).
